ygData.msgSnippet: Allright, that s quite enough from everyone. I mean it this time. Next post I see with something on the subject (I don t care if you re replying or commenting,

Allright, that's quite enough from everyone. I mean it this time. 
Next post I see with something on the subject (I don't care if you're 
replying or commenting, DO NOT argue), that person gets moderated 
untill further notice.

So no more arguing. If you really wanna tear each other's heads off, 
do it over private email as rAuq said.

And don't reply to this post either. This is the LAST post on this 
OOC subject (well, the last one who's writer doesn't get moderated).




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Hey KSL, why don't you practice what you preach and stop 
calling him 
> code?  And don't go telling me im not involved, because Soulstice, 
Dcoburn, 
> Rdahl, rauq, and i are partners, and if someone insults one of 
them, its my 
> business to defend them.
